Class DataError

java.lang.Object

java.io.Serializable
public class DataError
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class holds errors that occured while parsing or processing a data file. Last Updated: 10-16-2003 By: Paul Zepernick

Version:
1.0

Paul Zepernick
